name: The Lost Caves of Kroz
overview: The object of the game is to survive numerous levels of attacking monsters and ultimately find the pieces of the crown. For many years the Kingdom of Kroz has been a kingdom without a King! Can YOU restore the King to his throne and be the hero of the Kingdom of Kroz? Danger is everywhere, but so is fame and fortuen! Explore the long forgotten Caves of Kroz and battle intricate puzzle rooms to recover the royal crown. Locate all 32 pieces of the crown in fiendishly clever puzzle rooms! Starting initially as a homebrew production, this game was Officially licensed by Apogee and published in 2014.
